participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i work a part-time job at burger king.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Reflective and spirited, embracing life with joy and nostalgia.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever.

content.text: do you drink or smoke drugs? i'm 21.
